name: Whitehawk Ranch Golf Course
description: The Dick Bailey-designed course is sculpted into the natural surrounds in a masterful way. Each hole routes through gentle topography of rolling hills, with well-placed sand bunkers and subtle sloping greens making no shot a "stroll through the pines". But golf is just one of the splendors to enjoy while experiencing all Whitehawk Ranch Golf Club has to offer.

faqs.question: What’s included in Whitehawk Ranch golf group packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, guaranteed tee times at Whitehawk Ranch, carts, and concierge planning. Optional transportation, dining, and multi-course itineraries.

faqs.question: How much do Whitehawk Ranch packages cost?
faqs.answer: Typical range is $249–$449 per golfer depending on season, lodging selection, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you handle corporate or tournament groups?
faqs.answer: Yes—tee-time blocks, room blocks, tournament setup, and logistics for corporate and leisure groups.

meta.title: Whitehawk Ranch Golf Course | Graeagle Golf Groups & Stay and Play
meta.description: Plan Whitehawk Ranch near Graeagle with golf groups, tee times, and stay-and-play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and leisure trips. Rated 4.6/5 (287).

bodyText: Custom Whitehawk Ranch packages with lodging, guaranteed tee times, carts, and concierge planning for golf groups and corporate events.

White Hawk Ranch Golf Club is a championship experience set in the scenic and natural splendor of the High Sierra’s Mohawk Valley, just a short drive from Reno and Lake Tahoe.  Sounds of wildlife and babbling brooks complement the audible peace and majestic surroundings of pine, cedar, and quaking aspen tree-lined fairways and accessible greens.

Clio, CA
768 Whitehawk Drive
Clio, CA 96106
10 Minutes from Graeagle, CA
49 Minutes from Truckee, CA
71 Minutes from Downtown Reno
72 Minutes from Peppermill and Atlantis
94 Minutes from Carson City, NV
110 Minutes from Stateline, NV
110 Minutes from Minden, NV
pointOfView: Whitehawk Ranch is an absolute gem built within the farmlands and rolling hills of the Mohawk Valley. A combination of meadows, gentle topographic relief, and massive pine trees set the perfect stage for Dick Bailey's design talents. Bailey accentuated the natural beauty of the landscape by designing 12 holes within the meadows and 6 within the adjacent forested hillsides. Numerous lakes and Sulphur Creek, as well as immense plots of native flowers and grasses, play a big part in your experience, and your scoring. With some narrow fairways that penalize errant tee shots tightening your grip, straighter players will find birdie chances in numbers on their well conditioned, receptive and true-to-roll greens. Boasting four reachable par 5s and a drivable par 4, risk can breed reward; execute properly however, as mishits are penalized greatly when hit into the deep grasses lining the fairways and forest floors. The beauty of Whitehawk Ranch is beyond compare! The towering Lakes Basin mountain tops to the west and blocky peaks to the north and east make you feel in a world unto your own. The snack bar is well known for its delicious quickly prepped grinders, and a full bar and an ample beer selection satisfies the toughest thirsts. Pair Whitehawk Ranch with Grizzly Ranch and a stay at Plumas Pines Golf Resort and you're in for a memorable group outing!
contentParagraphs: White Hawk Ranch Golf Club is a championship experience set in the scenic and natural splendor of the High Sierra’s Mohawk Valley, just a short drive from Reno and Lake Tahoe. Sounds of wildlife and babbling brooks complement the audible peace and majestic surroundings of pine, cedar, and quaking aspen tree-lined fairways and accessible greens.

Whitehawk Ranch boasts a all-grass practice facility, with putting and chipping greens, sand bunkers, and a well-known snack bar taking care of all your food and beverage needs. As one of four great golf courses in the Graeagle area, few areas are suited as well for a pristine mountain golf experience that should absolutely include Whitehawk Ranch.
